title: Who is replacing Daniel Craig in James Bond? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thats hard to say,but Idris Elba four years ago was considered for the part. But he's too old now. He's almost 44. Maybe Mulkulay Caulkin would be a good James Bond! Matt Damon as Jason Borne is in his forties now! So it's hard to really say!
